extendedInfo.description: - widgets for remaining life, charging times, voltage, temperature- widget can be on lock screen- really cool dynamic real time graphics- analyze battery usage for weeks- no battery drain- Motorola hack : get 1% precision on battery level on Motorola devices (thanks Michal VeselovskÃ½ for having suggested and tested this feature)An advice : use the widget and keep the app at least two days otherwise you will miss most of its benefits.If you like this app, do not hesitate to tell you friends ;)I will be happy to answer your Battery snap related questions. Just send me an email!You like Battery snap? Then you'll love its complement, Battery snap Xtra! Removes all ads, alert level high and low, level display in the notification bar, and more widget styles!

reviews.title: Interface needs improving...
reviews.comment: otherwise OK.
reviews.author: John P Coates

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It works just fine - no probs. Thanks dev. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app in all my devices to monitor my battery and it\'s great. The developer is very responsive and fixed a problem I reported in under two hours. After trying this out for a few days it was a no-brainer to upgrade to the Xtra version. That was a long time ago and I\'m still very happy with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to Be
reviews.comment: An OK app but latests gives wrong info. No votlage and screen is buggy on the Infinity tf700t. need voltage drain to read 10th not jump 7 to 8 volts. Doesn\'t help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Autoscroll doesn\'t work (v2.1), otherwise like history function after finding how to use graph zoom).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: does exactly what I wanted it to. Go xtra to support dev

reviews.title: Really useful
reviews.comment: Helped me figure out my phone was overheating while I was charging+using it. Over all I\'m glad I picked this one.

reviews.comment: Charing has to be done

reviews.comment: Was 5 stars until latest update now with a 16mb running requirement, battery life is total crap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great on froyo, gingerbread, ICS, phones and tablets.
reviews.comment: Works great on all of my devices, phones and tablets, any os I have tried. And doesn\'t use any battery that I have seen in a year of using it.  Graph issue gone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dynamic graphic broken
reviews.comment: Was a great asp last time I had it,  but the version has a broken dynamic graphic,  which is pretty much what I got this for!  If fixed,  4 or 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app for over two years with no issues. This version does have a bug that causes the page to be blank. Tap the voltage select another display and then go back to get the graph to show.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brian
reviews.comment: Have loved this app for 18 months but after latest update 2.29 (27/2/12) main dynamic screen is blank yet data changes as finger moved. Occasionally graph appears! Now useless. HTC-Desire+Froyo
